answers.answer: Heck, I meant 42 yrs/o not 32!!!!!........wishful thinking!

question: Hey, just one more question......well maybe two!Quick recap: 32 yr/o female, 5'6". 120 lbs, no drugs or alcohol, don't have hypertensions or diabetes....have had migraine headaches since childhood.... been experiencing left hemibody tingling and numbness since July with random dizziness and visual disturbances.Does Basilar type migraine cause MRI hyperintensities in frontal white matter?What is "prominent capping" of the anterior horns of the lateral ventricles and what does it indicate????Thanks!Mel
title: It's me again!!!!!.... Bob
